name: My Little Pony Crystal Princess: The Runaway Rainbow
name_original: My Little Pony Crystal Princess: The Runaway Rainbow
description:
My Little Pony Crystal Princess: The Runaway Rainbow is an action game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
My Little Pony Crystal Princess: The Runaway Rainbow is available on Game Boy Advance.
Jonathan Dern produced the game. John Grusd directed the game.
